english.segment1: I'm so scared that you will see. All the weakness inside of me. I'm so scared of letting go. That the pain I've hid will show
english.segment2: I know you want to hear me speak. But I'm afraid that if I start to. I'll never stop
english.segment3: Chorus: I want you to know. You belong in my life. I love the hope. I see in your eyes. For you I would fly. At least I would try. For you I'll take. The last flight out
english.segment4: I'm afraid that. You will leave. As my secrets. Have been revealed. In my dreams. You'll always stay. Every breathing moment from now
english.segment5: I know you want to hear me speak. But I'm afraid that if I start to. I'll never stop
english.segment7: I cannot hold back. The truth no more. I let you wait too long. Although it's hard and scares me so. A life without you scares me more
